summary: Triad boss Lung, who has just escaped being killed in an assassination, hires five killers for his protection. Their grown solidarity is under compulsion when Lung gives a special order.
cast: Anthony Chau-Sang Wong|Francis Ng|Jackie Chung-yin Lui|Roy Cheung|Suet Lam|Simon Yam|Tian-Lin Wang|Eddy Ko|Elaine Eca Da Silva|Keiji Sato|Wai Ai|Man Shing Yau|Cub Chien|Paco Yick|Jerome Fung|Chi-Ping Chang|Ching-Ting Law|Jackson Ha|Andy Tse|Frank Michael Liu|Wing-Cheong Law|Wai Leung Hung|Kwok-Kit Lam|Man-Wai Luk|Kon Chung Tam|Wah-Wo Wong|Man-Jun Yuen
title: Cheung foh
